text: The 4th Light Cruiser Squadron was a naval formation of Light cruisers of the Royal Navy from 1915 to 1919. ==History== ===World War One=== Formed on 15 May 1915 it was then assigned to the Grand Fleet in August 1915 and remained attached the fleet until November 1918. ===Interwar=== In 1919 the squadron was assigned to the East Indies Station. ==Commodores/Rear-Admirals commanding== Post holders included: {| class="wikitable" ! !!
